subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Bobby Doerr eased the bow of his boat onto a rock to steady it in the river, then played the silvery jack salmon into an eddy, where he gently guided it into a net.
snippet: Bobby Doerr eased the bow of his boat onto a rock to steady it in the river, then played the silvery jack salmon into an eddy, where he gently guided it into a net.
